about_the_game: Cakewalk Mutant R3VOLUTION is a suite of 200 all new sounds for Z3TA+ 2 that equips modern music producers with a sound-designer's suite of ingredients for making techno, dubstep, trap, moombahtone, electro, drum n bass, and every subgenre in between. This library is stocked with mind-bending leads, pro synthesis sound FX, and an enormous spotlight collection of growling, lazer-shooting, earth-shattering brand new mutant bass patches.
detailed_description: Cakewalk Mutant R3VOLUTION is a suite of 200 all new sounds for Z3TA+ 2 that equips modern music producers with a sound-designer's suite of ingredients for making techno, dubstep, trap, moombahtone, electro, drum n bass, and every subgenre in between. This library is stocked with mind-bending leads, pro synthesis sound FX, and an enormous spotlight collection of growling, lazer-shooting, earth-shattering brand new mutant bass patches.
name: Z3TA+ 2 - Cakewalk Mutant R3VOLUTION Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista 32-bit/64-bit (SP2), Windows 7 32-bit/64-bit (SP1), Windows 8 32-bit/64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or newer processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280x800 minimum resolution, 32-bit
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: ASIO compatible hardware is recommended
  • Additional Notes: Expansion Pack for Z3TA+ 2. Requires Z3TA+ 2 which is available separately

short_description: Cakewalk Mutant R3VOLUTION is a suite of 200 all new sounds for Z3TA+ 2 that equips modern music producers with a sound-designer's suite of ingredients for making techno, dubstep, trap, moombahtone, electro, drum n bass, and every subgenre in between.
